description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is issuing this bid solicitation for the dredging of various fishing harbors in the Gaspésie Peninsula. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## F3731-230111-Dredging Various Sites Gaspesia

### issuance Information
* **Reference Number:** WS4445559414
* **Publication Date:** February 17, 2024
* **Closing Date and Time:** March 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Project Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation to contract for dredging services for various fishing harbors in the Gaspésie Peninsula. The proposed contract will cover the dredging of several sites and hiring a contractor for the maintenance dredging of these fishing harbors. 

### Solicitation Details
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Open bidding)
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Deliverables and Delivering Site 
* **Deliverables:** Dredging services
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec

### Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Procuring Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **End User Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

### Contact Information
* **Contact Person:** Jennifer Kirouac (PM SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Documents and Resources
* To obtain more information about this RFP, kindly visit the following website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18820835](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18820835)
### Notes
* The solicitation document is available in English.
* Information contained in this tender announcement takes precedence over any information contained in the procurement notice.
Please refer to the solicitation notice for qualifications, requirement, and evaluation.
